name: RC Flight Sim 3D Online
description:
Welcome to RC Flight Sim 3D Online, your mobile flight simulator! Play online with up to 12 friends and five exciting space planes. Chase down friends and perform amazing acrobats in this futuristic space station, Offers both joystick and tilt controls with adjustable sensitivity. Realistic flight simulation that's 100% FREE!

Never before has flying been so realistic & fun on mobile! Enjoy flying with friends and performing amazing acrobats in your futuristic space planes in this free online flight simulator. Featuring music by http://MatthewPablo.com

FEATURES:

*Realistic flight simulator for mobile!

*Free 8 player real time online play

*5 exotic space planes

*Exciting space station to explore

*Full screen immersive mode for Android 4.4+

FOLLOW US:

*Like on Facebook - http://facebook.com/DMTSource

*Follow on Twitter - https://twitter.com/@DMTSource

*Follow on Google+ - http://google.com/+Dmtsource

If you have any suggestions or comments please contact us, we hope to hear from you! DMT Source, LLC is an Orlando, FL USA, based developer.
